title: New: Four Tet – ‘Suit & Tie' & ‘For These Times'
body:
**Justin Timberlake**’s long awated 3rd LP, _The 20/20 Experience_, is just around the corner, dropping March 18 in the UK.

**Four Tet** has got his hands on the stems, creating this chopped and screwed bouncy little house number. He’s also shared a new track, “_For These Times_“, that appears on the Nonplus compilation [_Think and Change_](https://bleep.com/release/42160-various-artists-think-and-change).

Listen to both below.
